name: E.R. (2011) China Distinguidos
additionalNotes: The Distinguidos is a special cigar created to celebrate 50 years of diplomatic relationships between Cuba & China since 1960, the Bolivar Distinguidos is a rare treat to cigar aficionados. These cigars are a China edition cigar and are presented in a finely made bone china jar. Each jar is serial numbered. Only 2010 jars were made, with only 400 jars for Hong Kong.
